entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MemoryStream.Read() throws ArgumentOutOfRangexception in .NET 6 but ArgumentException in .NET 5 #61994
  • Unable to deserialize ienumerables that is not a list #61993
  • .NET seems to special-case renaming of EML files #61991
  • .NET SDK for Android + `$(EnableLLVM)`=True + `$(AotAssemblies)`=True + Windows: bad path quoting? #61979
  • Can't Publish Runtime Test Projects #61978
  • ANSICodePage returns zero for Traditional_Spanish_CI_AS collation #61977
    7.0.0
  • EventCounters pipeline on linux fires twice per cycle #61971
  • ApiController return new object() Error in .Net6 #61995
  • HttpHeaders Remove will throw for some header names #61968
    Future
  • BackgroundService.StartAsync() should await ApplicationStarted #61967
  • [API Proposal]: Review FxCop rules remaining to port #61964
  • QueryXmlWriter does not support Async #61963
  • [NativeAOT] Breaks constructor of System.Management.WbemDefPath #61960
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #61972
  • [API Proposal]: Making "Process asynchronous tasks as they complete" easy by using IAsyncEnumerable #61959
  • [API Proposal]: is there any methods can implement [:,:,::-1] operate in python #61957
  • Shifting a value in two directions once by a variable produces an unnecessary `and` instruction. #61955
  • Improve CreateDirectory on Windows #61954
  • ManagementEventWatcher only watches the 32-bit registry in an x64 .Net application #61980

Closed

  • Share RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar logic with SymbolicRegexMatcher #60885
    7.0.0
  • The value of the parameter cannot be changed when debugging the WASM project. #61974
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/disconnected/catchbeforetrybody_d/catchbeforetrybody_d.sh #61900
    7.0.0
  • Remove "requestId" arguments from HTTP tests loopback server API #58239
    7.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Create immutable types once #61961
  • Garbage collection method is not manageable by environment variables in .net 6 #61674
    7.0.0
  • The purpose of the ref folder in dotnet/runtime source #61965
  • Move throw calls inside `ThrowHelper.Get*` methods #59378
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Malformed `testResults.xml` causing CI test runs to fail #61749
    7.0.0
  • Proxy-Support header case sensitive causes proxied API failure when using HttpClient #61414
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add extension method AsReadOnly() for IDictionary<TKey, TValue> #33033
    7.0.0
  • Add .Clear() method to MemoryCache #45593
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Please add a method to the C# library to copy a directory with all its contents #61873
  • cmake failure when building mono+libs -os Android #61953
  • StreamReader can use ArrayPool instead of always allocating buffers #60694
  • It seems .NET 5 tries to precompile expressions when params available even if usage is conditional (IF) #60735
  • JsonSerializer does not serialize DBNull.Value as null #418
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #61992
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.Diagnostics.EventLog #61990
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove support for Classic Xamarin for the Selector.GetHandle optimization, and add newer platforms. #61989
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Restrict the Selector.GetHandle intrinsic to GetHandle implementations that take an IntPtr. #61987
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 4 #61986
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #61985
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update hash of the new CSE when resizing #61984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that we don't try to get the simdBaseJitType for scalar intrinsics #61982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] HTTP Pool Manager Scavange fix #61976
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in System.DirectoryServices #61975
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Splitting the hardware intrinsic tests into more test groupings #61973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Don't merge CI test only] #61970
  • [release/6.0] Environment variable should override property for gcServer. #61969
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add some tests that validate debug info through ETW events #61962
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reorganize libs.native #61958
    community-contribution
  • Add RequiresDynamicCodeAttribute to runtime #61956
    new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start building a universal System.Linq.Expressions library #61952
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Make sanitizers work again in coreclr #61948
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61930
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Use GeneratedDllImport in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices, System.Drawing.Primitives, System.Management, System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData, System.Speech, System.Windows.Extensions #61949
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Stabilize host's UpgradeCode and ProviderKey #61810
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Don't use recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #61677
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Disable several GenericMath tests on iOS/tvOS #61922
    area-System.Runtime
  • Environment variable should override property for gcServer. #61950
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Move inline throw statements to `ThrowHelper` #61746
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] workaround test results corruption #61841
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Proxy-Support check to be case insensitive #61446
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Clear() to MemoryCache #57631
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 7.0.0
  • Disable changing align nop padding to breakpoints for arm64 under jit stress #61951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1482158 #61858
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add backtracking loops, backreferences, and if-then-else constructs to Regex "simplified" code gen #61906
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • [wasm] Misc CI/test run improvements #61937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve some cases of bad debug info propagation in optimized code #61846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [6.0] Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61931
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Brand release/6.0-maui branch appropriately #61792
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][wasm] debug multiple runtimes #61848
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Initial version with the following features: #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] Eval fixes for static class eval #61660
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Remove AOT warnings for S.Drawing.Common #61567
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • prevent concurrent access to IO buffers on macOS #61723
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement PEM exports for RSA PKCS#1 and ECPrivateKey #61946
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Support zero-byte reads on HTTP response streams #61913
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix support for nested structs with explicit layout #61467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some code using ECAlgorithm #61943
    area-System.Security
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Disable poisoning for large structs #61601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Use separate partials for iOS&tvOS instead of UnknowUnix in System.Diagnostics.Process #61871
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Fix Android crypto asserts #61827
    area-System.Security, os-android, community-contribution
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Skip Linq tests, which are not supported in interpreter only build (without FEATURE_COMPILE) #61914
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.IO
  • [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #61927
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
